nodes.text: A disease chamber was a portable piece of technology known to have been carried by the criminal "Marauder of Endor".

The disease chamber was mentioned in a one-page wanted poster, written by Bob Carrau for the 1993 book Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a publication that collects concept designs and photographs from various George Lucas projects. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
